IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: HOPE NETWORK IS A CHRISTIAN ORGANIZATION THAT EMPOWERS PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES OR DISADVANTAGES TO ACHIEVE THEIR HIGHEST LEVEL OF INDEPENDENCE.
IRS990.MissionDescription: HOPE NETWORK IS A CHRISTIAN ORGANIZATION THAT EMPOWERS PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES OR DISADVANTAGES TO ACHIEVE THEIR HIGHEST LEVEL OF INDEPENDENCE.
IRS990.Description: OUR WEST LAKE PROGRAM PROVIDES SERVICES TO ADULTS WITH SEVERE AND PERSISTENT MENTAL ILLNESS.

Activity2.Description: OUR DART PROGRAM PROVIDES MENTAL HEALTH SERVICE TO CHILDREN UNDER 18 WITH BEHAVIORAL / MENTAL HEALTH ILLNESS.

Activity3.Description: OUR HARBOR POINT PROGRAM PROVIDES SERVICES TO ADULTS WITH SEVERE AND PERSISTENT MENTAL ILLNESS AND SEXUAL OFFENDER HISTORY.

ActivityOther.Description: OTHER MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES, AFC HOUSING, CASE MANAGEMENT AND ADULT DAY SERVICES FOR THE ELDERLY.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Effective October 1, 2009, the Network adopted Financial Accounting Standards Board (FASB) Codification Section 740-10 provisions which clarify the accounting and reporting for uncertainties in income tax law. The provisions prescribe a comprehensive model for the financial statement recognition, measurement, presentation and disclosure of uncertain tax positions taken or expected to be taken in income tax returns. There was no impact on the financial statements upon adopting these provisions.

Form990ScheduleMPartII.Explanation: HOPE NETWORK FOUNDATION SOLICITS AND PROCESSES NONCASH CONTRIBUTIONS FOR THE HOPE NETWORK AFFILIATES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: HOPE NETWORK CORPORATE IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF THE ORGANIZATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: HOPE NETWORK CORPORATE IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF THE ORGANIZATION AND CAN APPOINT DIRECTORS TO THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTOR.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: APPROVAL FROM HOPE NETWORK CORPORATE AND ITS BOARD OF TRUSTEES IS REQUIRED FOR CERTAIN LARGE EXPENDITURES AND OTHER MAJOR DECISIONS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FORMS 990 ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE BOARD FOR REVIEW BY UPLOADING THEM TO THE COMPANY'S INTRANET SITE. THE FORM 990 IS ALSO REVIEWED BY A NUMBER OF LEVELS OF MANAGEMENT, INCLUDING THE PERSON SIGNING THE FORM.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS ARE COMPLETED BY ALL BOARD MEMBERS ANNUALLY

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: REVIEWS/STUDIES OF COMPARATIVE EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION WERE DONE BY TWO EXTERNAL AND ONE INTERNAL GROUPS. ALL THREE REVIEWS WERE PRESENTED TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD WHO MET, DISCUSSED, AND TOOK ACTION. BOARD CHAIR COMMUNICATES THE GROUP DECISION IN WRITING TO APPROPRIATE STAFF TO EXECUTE CHANGES

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: HOPE NETWORK MAKES DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE AS REQUIRED BY LAW. PAPER COPIES ARE PROVIDED UPON REQUEST PRESENTED IN PERSON AT HOPE NETWORK LEADERSHIP CENTER.
AS WITH PRIOR YEARS, THE AUDIT COMMITTEE ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
